name: views/projecttask/servicereport
description: Project Task Service Report Component Adds a button to view mode of Completed Tasks to preview the Service Report pdf and email to the customer.

members.name: delay
members.description: Delay in milliseconds before confirming with the user to send the email.

members.name: hidden
members.description: This view is to be shown or hidden

members.name: send
members.description: Confirm text before sending the email. Clear this value to only preview the pdf.

members.name: success
members.description: Alert text when the email is successfully sent.
